responsibilities: Apply relevant AI and machine learning techniques to build and launch generative AI solutions using Meta’s Llama and other state-of-the-art LLMs.
Define and execute on a strategy to drive adoption of Llama and other Meta’s AI/ML platform offerings.
Work closely with cloud providers (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and Meta’s partners on deep learning & Llama integrations.
Be a subject matter technical expert and have strategic influence on partners and internal teams at Meta.

Provide thought leadership, raising awareness of Llama & Generative AI services and share best practices through forums such as medium blogs, whitepapers, reference architectures, and public-speaking events.
Develop reference architectures, samples, and other materials to share with the broader Meta developer community.
Work with key partners and the Llama developer community to optimize existing generative AI models for improved performance, scalability, and efficiency.
Lead technical strategy and roadmap for long-term strategic partners with high level of autonomy.
Plan, lead, and execute on projects with minimal direction & oversight from leadership.
Communicate feedback, updates, and status to direct team as well as relevant cross-functional teams.

Create clear and concise documentation, including technical specifications, best practices guides, and presentations, to communicate complex AI concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders internally and externally.
qualifications: Proficiency in software development in languages like Python, Java, Go, Rust, C/C++.
Experience with at least one LLM such as Llama, GPT, Claude, Falcon, etc.
Experience with at least one Deep Learning framework such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, MXNet, Caffe.
Experience building cloud solutions on any cloud and with Open Source cloud stacks like Kubernetes, Kubeflow, Docker containers.
Ability to communicate and present to technical and business audiences.
Understanding of Responsible AI and risk identification.
Ability to develop technical accelerators, case studies, white papers, blogs, reference architectures, and/or presentations.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI and language models. The responsibilities mention building and launching generative AI solutions using Meta’s Llama and other state-of-the-art LLMs, which directly points to working with language models. Additionally, there is a focus on driving adoption of Llama and other AI/ML platform offerings, which are related to language models. The job also involves working with cloud providers on deep learning and Llama integrations, optimizing generative AI models, and providing thought leadership on Llama  Generative AI services. 

The skills required for the job further support this analysis. There is a specific mention of experience with at least one LLM such as Llama, GPT, Claude, Falcon, etc., which are all examples of language models. The job also requires experience with deep learning frameworks, which are commonly used in developing and deploying language models. 

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills strongly indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
